parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF:11240014), which is typically associated with electoral propaganda in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Dan Cosma, a Senator candidate for AUR (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor) in Bistrița-Năsăud, clearly identifying him as a candidate participating in the parliamentary elections.  This satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Dan Cosma and the AUR party in the parliamentary elections. Phrases like "Nu pot ei fura cât putem noi vota!" and "La parlamentare, votați AUR – poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!" directly urge voters to vote for a specific candidate and party. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, satisfying Article 36 (7) - c. The overall tone and message are explicitly designed to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party with a clear call to action.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content transcends personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, employing persuasive language and imagery to sway public opinion in favor of a particular candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>472663805845598</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, given its explicit endorsement of Dan Cosma and AUR, its use of a CMF number, its targeting of the parliamentary elections, and its clear call to action to vote for a specific candidate, strongly suggests it constitutes electoral propaganda.  The post's design, language, and overall message are all geared towards influencing voters' choices. While the post might contain some elements that could be interpreted as expressing a political opinion, the dominant purpose is clearly electoral promotion. The provided data shows a significant reach (10K-15K impressions, reach estimate >1M), indicating a substantial potential impact on the electoral process.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>DAN COSMA</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Dan Cosma], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 472663805845598) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează explicit candidatura sa la Senat din partea AUR, folosind fraze precum "Nu pot ei fura cât putem noi vota!" și "La parlamentare, votați AUR – poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!", având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea sa și a partidului AUR. Postarea, care a beneficiat de o investiție financiară între 100 și 199 RON, a generat între 10.000 și 15.000 de impresii, cu o estimare a acoperirii de peste 1 milion de persoane, conține numărul CMF: 11240014 și este asociată cu adresa de email cosdan63@gmail.com și numărul de telefon +407666663210.  Aceste elemente, coroborate cu lipsa oricărui element jurnalistic obiectiv, demonstrează clar intenția de a influența procesul electoral prin propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
